title: Mustang Showdown Race Manager Program
carddescription: A small python program to manage preliminary race results for multi-round triathlon events

features.title: Athlete Search
features.text: Load athlete data from Excel files, including details like names, teams, bib numbers, and performance times, to automatically organize racers into heats based on swim and run times.

features.title: Racer Analysis
features.text: Analyze athlete performance across multiple rounds. The program dynamically adjusts heat assignments based on real-time race results, ensuring balanced competition with top performers advancing.

features.title: Race Analysis
features.text: Generate detailed race reports after each round, including heat assignments, performance results, and rankings. The program supports exporting results to text and CSV files for further review or printing.
